name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Maps QuickClick - Search to Maps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly open Google Maps from the Search page by clicking on a map image or the Maps tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revive the direct Google Maps access with this simple extension. 

Click on Maps tab re-integrated below the search bar or on any static or interactive map in your Google search results to open Google Maps instantly.

Key Features:
- The Maps tab displays instantly without layout shift and remains reliably positioned
- Multilingual support: The Maps tab is localized for 52 languages
- All map images (static and dynamic) within search results are clickable, navigating directly to Google Maps

Customization Options:
- Toggle the display of the Maps tab on or off
- Select whether maps open in a new tab
- Enable or disable localization for the Maps tab

Additional Features:
- Precise location mapping, even for incomplete or misspelled address searches
- Accurately handles searches for distant locations, ensuring the correct place is shown on Google Maps
- Multi-map Support: Multiple map images on a search results page are all clickable and accurately linked to their respective locations
- Supports dark mode

Opera Compatibility: Opera users can also enjoy full functionality by enabling the "Allow access to search page results" option in the Opera extension settings.

What's New?
v1.5.3
- Add support for all Google domains

v1.5.2
- The Maps tab is displayed with the correct style across all variations of the tab bar
- The Maps tab remains stably placed, regardless of the active tab
- There is no desynchronization of Maps tab styles when switching between dark and light modes
